title: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrect statement about custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrect statement about custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting
OB: The current implementation of the servlet does not follow the statement in chapter 7.1.1 of the Servlet 3.0 documentation. The default 'jsessionid' cookie name is used for URL rewriting instead of the custom cookie name specified.
EB: Expected result: If the statement in chapter 7.1.1 is to be followed, the URL rewriting should use the custom cookie name specified, resulting in the Reload link being 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Deploy the provided 'cookiename.war' file. 
2. Access 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'. 
3. Observe the behavior where the default 'jsessionid' cookie name is used for URL rewriting instead of the custom cookie name.
